      返回LiteJobConfiguration.Builder的com.dangdang.ddframe.job.lite.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.disabled(boolean disabled)
      设置作业是否启动时禁止.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.enableJMonitor(boolean enableJMonitor) 
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.jobShardingStrategyClass(String jobShardingStrategyClass)
      设置作业分片策略实现类全路径.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.maxTimeDiffSeconds(int maxTimeDiffSeconds)
      设置最大容忍的本机与注册中心的时间误差秒数.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.monitorExecution(boolean monitorExecution)
      设置监控作业执行时状态.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.monitorPort(int monitorPort)
      设置作业辅助监控端口.
      static LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.newBuilder(JobTypeConfiguration jobConfig)
      创建Lite作业配置构建器.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.overwrite(boolean overwrite)
      设置本地配置是否可覆盖注册中心配置.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.reconcileIntervalMinutes(int reconcileIntervalMinutes)
      设置修复作业服务器不一致状态服务执行间隔分钟数.
      LiteJobConfiguration.Builder LiteJobConfiguration.Builder.status(String status)
